Syntax::Utility::DeleteFOPair

Syntax::Utility::DeleteFOPair< T, S > Class Template Reference

Delete Function object. More...

#include <FunctionObjects.h>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

template<class T, class S>
class Syntax::Utility::DeleteFOPair< T, S >

Delete Function object.

Function object to delete a pointer. S must be a pointer type or this will fail. Used for map type containers. T is the key which is not deleted, and S is a pointer value

Example: 

			class MyClass;
			...
			hash_map<string,MyClass*> objects;
			//fill with data
			..
			//now i want to clear it, but want to delete all the objects first
			for_each(objects.begin(),objects.end(),DeleteFO<string,MyClass*>());
			objects.clear();
